fields.label: Policy Statement
fields.description: Ensures fair, inclusive workplace free from discrimination, in line with South African and international standards.

fields.label: Equal Opportunity Commitments
options: Equal access to training and development

fields.label: Anti-Harassment and Bullying
options: Zero tolerance for harassment or bullying

fields.label: Accommodation for Disabilities
fields.description: Company will provide reasonable accommodation for workers with disabilities in line with law.

fields.label: Responsibilities
options: Employees treat others respectfully and report concerns

fields.label: Reporting and Accountability
fields.description: Employees can report incidents confidentially; retaliation is prohibited.

fields.label: Policy Review
fields.description: Policy is reviewed annually and updated to ensure ongoing compliance.
